attributes.action: Cancel 2021 exams and use CAGs instead
attributes.additional_details: Many students including myself have suffered tremendously last year when we went into lockdown and have fallen behind on content. Even after returning to school, many students have to self-isolate on several occasions causing them to fall further behind. It has affected many student's mental health. It is unfair for students to sit exams under these difficult circumstances. Scotland and Wales have already cancelled exams so it is only right for England to do the same.
attributes.background: All GCSEs and A-levels should be cancelled and there should be teacher assessed grades instead. Teachers should use any previous assessments and coursework to calculate grades.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel GCSE and A-levels in 2021 replace with Course Work and Teacher Assessment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564696
